store-page.general-information:
As we like to build apps that we would happily use ourselves, almost all features are available for free and there are no fullscreen or video ads.
However, if you want to show your support, you can buy some goodies here. Of course, every one of these is a one-time purchase, and we promise that this will not change in the future. Happy Dodoing ü¶§

receipt-scanner.privacy-notice.title: Privacy notice
receipt-scanner.privacy-notice.content: Your receipts are processed by Google Gemini AI. The image is directly sent from your device to Google, without being sent to our server.. If you don't trust Google with your data, please don't use this feature.
social-login.privacy-notice.title: Privacy notice
social-login.privacy-notice.content: When using social login, the provider (Google, Apple) will send us your email address and a unique identifier. We do NOT store the e-mail and only store the identifier in a secure format. The provider does not get any information about anything you do in the app, it merely serves as a proof of your identity.
